articles.title: 4-billion-year-old nitrogen-containing organic molecules discovered in Martian meteorites - Nanowerk
articles.description: Using advanced techniques, scientists have detected organic compounds containing nitrogen in Martian meteorites which were ejected from Mars' surface some 15 million years ago, proving that evidence for early life can be preserved and detected today.
